column4: have you ever heard of a record for the maximum ubuntu install ?   like if you apt-get install everything
I think your problem is not your machine.. but your router..(forwarding your request)
I bet.. the better alternative.. change the port number for ssh in your machine2 so that your router will know where to forward your request
yeah that is the problem it's the customer's router so I don't have access :/     I don't have unlimited ports either bc it's not my network.
